description: Retrieves a list of on-call rotations.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.

nested_items.name: Rotations
nested_items.description: Information about rotations that meet the filter criteria.

nested_items.name: RotationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rotation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the rotation.

nested_items.name: ContactIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the contacts assigned to the rotation team.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the rotation becomes active.

nested_items.name: TimeZoneId
nested_items.description: The time zone the rotation's activity is based on, in Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) format. For example: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'UTC', or 'Asia/Seoul'.

nested_items.name: Recurrence
nested_items.description: Information about when an on-call rotation is in effect and how long the rotation period lasts.

nested_items.name: MonthlySettings
nested_items.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly.

nested_items.name: DayOfMonth
nested_items.description: The day of the month when monthly recurring on-call rotations begin.

nested_items.name: HandOffTime
nested_items.description: The time of day when a monthly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: WeeklySettings
nested_items.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur weekly.

nested_items.name: DayOfWeek
nested_items.description: The day of the week when weekly recurring on-call shift rotations begins.

nested_items.name: HandOffTime
nested_items.description: The time of day when a weekly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: DailySettings
nested_items.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur daily.

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: NumberOfOnCalls
nested_items.description: The number of contacts, or shift team members designated to be on call concurrently during a shift. For example, in an on-call schedule containing ten contacts, a value of 2 designates that two of them are on call at any given time.

nested_items.name: ShiftCoverages
nested_items.description: Information about the days of the week included in on-call rotation coverage.

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: (list) ---

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_items.name: RecurrenceMultiplier
nested_items.description: The number of days, weeks, or months a single rotation lasts.
